sentences.en: " Let us make a vow to the dead "
He had broken his vow of poverty.
sentences.cn: 他违背了他安贫乐道的誓言。

sentences.en: He took a vow of chastity and celibacy.
sentences.cn: 他发下守贞禁欲的誓言。

sentences.en: He'll vow that I was the direct cause of the marriage.
sentences.cn: 他将会公开宣布我是直接促成这桩婚事的人.

sentences.en: I am under a vow to drink no wine.
I had to admire David's  vow that he would leave the programme.
sentences.cn: 戴维发誓要离开这个项目，我不得不对他表示钦佩。

sentences.en: I had to admire David's vow that he would leave the programme.
sentences.cn: 戴维发誓要离开这个项目，我不得不对他表示钦佩。

sentences.en: I made a silent vow to be more careful in the future.
sentences.cn: 我暗暗发誓，日后要倍加小心。

sentences.en: I make a vow at a time to do this.
I solemnly vowed that someday I would return to live in Europe.
sentences.cn: 我郑重起誓总有一天我要重回欧洲生活。

sentences.en: Jim made a vow that he would find his wife’s killer.
sentences.cn: 吉姆发誓要找到杀害他妻子的凶手。

sentences.en: My parents are under a vow to go to church every Sunday.
sentences.cn: 我父母许愿,每星期日都去做礼拜.

sentences.en: Once he took the vow his loyalty never wavered.
sentences.cn: 一旦他发了誓,他的忠诚从不动摇.

sentences.en: People in some religious orders take a vow of celibacy.
sentences.cn: 有些宗教修会的人发誓不结婚.

sentences.en: She took a vow never to lend money to anyone again.
sentences.cn: 她发誓绝不再借钱给别人.

sentences.en: The girl was keeping some vow which I could not describe.
sentences.cn: 这个姑娘正遵守某种我无法形容的誓言.

sentences.en: While many models vow to go back to college, few do.
sentences.cn: 很多模特发誓要重回大学校园，但很少有人做到。

trans.tran_en: If you vow to do something, you make a serious promise or decision that you will do it
